text: Laen nibak nyan jaroe tapeuhah p Dalam keh bajee taculok jaroe ‘Oh tasuet jinoe jeuet puteh leupah ‘Oh tasuet jaroeteuh puteh meuprak Kon sabab supak cahya trang leupah Meu yoteuh tagruep jaroe bak badan Teuh bandua nyan dali bak Allah Ubak Peuraʻeun deungon kaom h Keubit bandum fasek sileupah
